name: A taste of Vancouver Downtown
description: Experience the culture of my lovely city.  Whether you're looking for a glimpse of Vancouver's lovely scenery, gourmet restaurants, and a taste of our night life, you get it all with this trip!  This trip is to showcase my favorite places in the heart of the city.  Vancouver exhibits its own unique culture, ambience and vibe.  Join me in discovering the city through the eyes of a proud Vancouverite!
